section.heading: Suspension of enforcement.
section.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of District law, enforcement of this chapter by the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs is suspended until October 1, 2000.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Sept. 26, 1995, D.C. Law 11-52, § 811, 42 DCR 3684

annoGroup.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 807 of Multiyear Budget Spending Reduction and Support Temporary Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 10-253, March 23, 1995, law notification 42 DCR 1652).

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary addition of section, see § 811 of the Omnibus Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-124, July 27, 1995, 42 DCR 4160).
For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 1002 of the Fiscal Year 1999 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-41, March 31, 1999, 46 DCR 3446).
